content.html:
I'm not sure how this is being used currently, so I don't know how to comment...

@jrivero Yeah you would need different versions for Fuerte. There is a different version of catkin Fuerte, but honestly you don't want to deal with that.

If you intend for this to be a repository of catkin packages, then it should not be laid out like a catkin workspace, as you would clone this repository into a catkin workspace, potentially with other repositories.
